participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily has a strong connection with her pets and enjoys the simple pleasures of rural life. She's passionate about sports, especially NHL hockey, which adds excitement to her everyday routine.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is practical and down-to-earth, with a hands-on approach to life. He has a playful side but grapples with some fears from his past, which makes him a bit guarded, especially in social situations.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
